channel.title: CVE Feed for madrasthemes -- MAS Companies For WP Job Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for madrasthemes -- MAS Companies For WP Job Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-9206|2024-10-18T06:51:26.281Z -- madrasthemes -- mas%20companies%20for%20wp%20job%20manager
item.description: The MAS Companies For WP Job Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.13. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
